memberdef.argsstring: (env::MotorGroup &left_motors, env::MotorGroup &right_motors, env::IMU &imu, Config config, Logger logger=tao::Logger())
memberdef.name: DifferentialDrivetrain

briefdescription.para: Constructs a new DifferentialDrivetrain object using two motor groups and an imu.

parameterdescription.para: A reference to a env::MotorGroup object representing the left side of the drivetrain.
A reference to a env::MotorGroup object representing the right side of the drivetrain.
A reference to a env::IMU object for tracking the drivetrain's orientation through a imu.
A DifferentialDrivetrain::Config structure describing values related to the drivetrain for tuning.

briefdescription.para: Constructs a new DifferentialDrivetrain object using two motor groups.

parameterdescription.para: A reference to a env::MotorGroup object representing the left side of the drivetrain.
A reference to a env::MotorGroup object representing the right side of the drivetrain.
A DifferentialDrivetrain::Config structure describing values related to the drivetrain for tuning.

memberdef.argsstring: (env::MotorGroup &left_motors, env::MotorGroup &right_motors, env::Encoder &left_encoder, env::Encoder &right_encoder, env::IMU &imu, Config config, Logger logger=tao::Logger())
memberdef.name: DifferentialDrivetrain

briefdescription.para: Constructs a new DifferentialDrivetrain object using two motor groups, an imu, and two tracking encoders.

parameterdescription.para: A reference to a env::MotorGroup object representing the left side of the drivetrain.
A reference to a env::MotorGroup object representing the right side of the drivetrain.
A reference to a env::Encoder object representing the left tracking encoder.
A reference to a env::Encoder object representing the right tracking encoder.
A reference to a env::IMU object for tracking the drivetrain's orientation through a imu.
A DifferentialDrivetrain::Config structure describing values related to the drivetrain for tuning.

memberdef.argsstring: (env::MotorGroup &left_motors, env::MotorGroup &right_motors, env::Encoder &left_encoder, env::Encoder &right_encoder, Config config, Logger logger=tao::Logger())
memberdef.name: DifferentialDrivetrain

briefdescription.para: Constructs a new DifferentialDrivetrain object using two motor groups and two tracking encoders.

parameterdescription.para: A reference to a env::MotorGroup object representing the left side of the drivetrain.
A reference to a env::MotorGroup object representing the right side of the drivetrain.
A reference to a env::Encoder object representing the left tracking encoder.
A reference to a env::Encoder object representing the right tracking encoder.
A DifferentialDrivetrain::Config structure describing values related to the drivetrain for tuning.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current global position of the drivetrain as a Vector2 object.

simplesect.para: The current global position of the drivetrain.

briefdescription.para: Gets the average wheel travel distance of each side of the drivetrain.

simplesect.para: A pair representing the total distance traveled by the left and right wheels of the drivetrain.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current counter-clockwise heading of the drivetrain in degrees.

simplesect.para: If the imu is not configured or installed, the heading will be calculated based on encoders only, using the drivetrain's track width measurements.
The current heading of the drivetrain in degrees.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current gain constants of the drive PID controller.

simplesect.para: The current gains as a PIDController::Gains struct.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current gains of the turn PID controller.

simplesect.para: The current gains as a PIDController::Gains struct.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current error of the drive PID controller.

simplesect.para: The current drive error (distance between the desired position and the current position).

briefdescription.para: Gets the current error of the turn PID controller.

simplesect.para: The current turn error (distance in degrees between the desired position and the current position).

briefdescription.para: Gets the minimum acceptable error threshold for the drive PID controller to consider its movements settled.
Gets the minimum acceptable error threshold in degrees for the drive PID controller to consider its movements settled.
Gets the lookahead distance used by the drivetrain's pure pursuit controller.
Gets the track width of the drivetrain.

simplesect.para: The distance between the left and right drivetrain wheels.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current external gear ratio of the drivetrain.

simplesect.para: The current external gear ratio as a quotient.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current maximum velocity cap for forwards/backwards driving.
Gets the current maximum velocity cap for turning.
Generates a DifferentialDrivetrain::Config structure from the current drivetrain state.
Indicates if the drivetrain is currently settled (within the threshold of both minimum error ranges).

simplesect.para: True if the drivetrain is settled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Sets the minimum acceptable error threshold for the drive PID controller to consider its movements settled.

parameterdescription.para: The new minimum error threhold.

briefdescription.para: Sets the minimum acceptable error threshold in degrees for the turn PID controller to consider its movements settled.

parameterdescription.para: The new minimum error threhold in degrees.

briefdescription.para: Sets the lookahead distance used by the drivetrain's pure pursuit controller.

parameterdescription.para: The new lookahead radius

briefdescription.para: Sets the gain constants for the drive PID controller.

parameterdescription.para: A PIDController::Gains structure containing the new proportional, integral and derivative gain constants.

briefdescription.para: Sets the gain constants for the turn PID controller.

parameterdescription.para: A PIDController::Gains structure containing the new proportional, integral and derivative gain constants.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current gear external ratio of the drivetrain.

simplesect.para: This could be useful for robots with a variable gear ratio (PTO) system.

parameterdescription.para: The new external gear ratio as a quotient.

briefdescription.para: Sets the maximum velocity cap for forwards/backwards driving.

parameterdescription.para: A percentage of the new maximum velocity cap.

briefdescription.para: Sets the maximum velocity cap for turning.

parameterdescription.para: A percentage of the new maximum velocity cap.

briefdescription.para: Starts the tracking period for autonomous movement.

parameterdescription.para: A 2D vector representing the starting cartesian coordinates of the drivetrain.
An angle in degrees representing the starting orientation of the drivetrain.

briefdescription.para: Stops all threads used for tracking and movement, restoring manual control of the drivetrain.
Moves the drivetrain directly forwards or backwards along the x-axis.

parameterdescription.para: The distance that the drivetrain will move relative to it's current position.
Determines if the function should block the current thread until settled (within drive_tolerance for 10 iterations).

briefdescription.para: Turns the drivetrain to an absolute heading.

parameterdescription.para: The angle in degrees to rotate the drivetrain to.
Determines if the function should block the current thread until settled (within turn_tolerance for 10 iterations).

briefdescription.para: Turns the drivetrain face towards the direction of a point.

parameterdescription.para: A 2D vector representing the desired coordinates to face towards.
Determines if the function should block the current thread until settled (within turn_tolerance for 10 iterations).

briefdescription.para: Moves the drivetrain to a target point.

parameterdescription.para: A 2D vector representing the absolute target coordinates to move to.
Determines the direction that the robot will face to move to the target. The auto direction will always take the most efficient turn.
Determines if the function should block the current thread until settled (within drive tolerance for 10 iterations).

briefdescription.para: Moves the drivetrain along a set of path waypoints.

parameterdescription.para: A vector of 2D vectors representing waypoints forming a path..

briefdescription.para: Stops and holds the drivetrain at its current position and heading.

parameterdescription.para: Determines if the function should block the current thread until settled (within tolerance for 10 iterations).

briefdescription.para: A class representing a nonholonomic drivetrain using position tracking and PID motion control.
